about_text: Sahyog is dedicated to streamlining disaster relief by giving NGOs a unified platform to manage resources, volunteers, and communication—no matter where they are.
testimonial_1_quote: Sahyog helped us coordinate volunteers seamlessly during last year’s floods. The real-time chat saved countless hours.
testimonial_2_quote: Thanks to the donation tracker, our donors feel more connected and confident their funds are used transparently.
testimonial_3_quote: The multilingual feature made it easy to communicate with rural families in their own language—truly game-changing.
volunteer_thanks: Thank you for volunteering! We’ll reach out soon.
name: Name
footer_description: Your support network in times of crisis.
about_intro: Sahyog is a compassionate platform designed to provide emotional, psychological, and crisis support for individuals facing mental health challenges. We believe no one should suffer in silence.
about_mission: We aim to build a safe, accessible, and multilingual digital space where people can seek help, talk to trained volunteers, and access resources without fear or stigma. Sahyog empowers communities through awareness, empathy, and collective healing.
multilingual_assistance: Multilingual assistance in English, Hindi & Japanese
partnerships: Collaboration with mental health NGOs and institutes
about_team: Sahyog is driven by students, mental health advocates, and volunteers from diverse backgrounds. We collaborate with psychologists, social workers, and academic institutions to ensure meaningful impact.
about_cta: Whether you want to volunteer, donate, or just spread the word — every effort counts. Let's build a kinder, stronger support system together.
faq_subtitle: Here are some answers to common questions about Sahyog.
faq_a1: Sahyog is a crisis support platform providing confidential emotional assistance and mental health resources, especially for students and young adults.
faq_a2: Yes, Sahyog is completely free to use. We are a non-profit initiative supported by volunteers and donations.
faq_q3: Who can I talk to on Sahyog?
faq_a3: You can connect with trained volunteer listeners who are empathetic and available to help. We are not a replacement for professional therapy but offer immediate emotional support.
faq_a4: Yes. Your privacy is our priority. We do not store any identifiable data unless you choose to share it.
faq_q5: How can I become a volunteer?
faq_a5: You can apply on our Volunteer page. We offer short training sessions to help you prepare for listening and crisis response roles.
contact_subtitle: We’re here to support you. Reach out anytime.
